appetizers.name: Crispy Calamari
appetizers.description: Golden-fried calamari rings, perfectly crispy on the outside and tender on the inside. Served with a side of zesty marinara sauce for dipping.

appetizers.name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
appetizers.description: Creamy spinach and artichoke dip, baked until bubbly and golden brown. Served with warm tortilla chips for a delightful combination of flavors.

appetizers.name: Bruschetta Platter
appetizers.description: Toasted baguette slices topped with a fresh mixture of diced tomatoes, aromatic basil, and a drizzle of balsamic glaze, creating a burst of Italian flavors.

coldSandwiches.name: Turkey Avocado Wrap
coldSandwiches.description: A wholesome wrap filled with tender slices of turkey, creamy avocado, crisp lettuce, and juicy tomatoes, all nestled in a whole wheat wrap for a satisfying, nutritious bite.

coldSandwiches.name: Classic Italian Sub
coldSandwiches.description: A classic Italian sub featuring layers of savory ham, zesty salami, provolone cheese, crisp lettuce, and juicy tomatoes, drizzled with Italian dressing and served on a fresh sub roll.

coldSandwiches.name: Caprese Sandwich
coldSandwiches.description: A delightful Caprese sandwich showcasing the perfect harmony of fresh mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, and aromatic basil, all drizzled with balsamic glaze and served on soft ciabatta bread.

hotSandwiches.name: Grilled Chicken Panini
hotSandwiches.description: Tender grilled chicken, melted provolone, and a flavorful pesto sauce, all pressed between slices of soft ciabatta bread for a satisfying panini experience.

hotSandwiches.name: BBQ Pulled Pork
hotSandwiches.description: Slow-cooked pulled pork tossed in barbecue sauce, piled high on a soft brioche bun for a deliciously messy and flavorful sandwich.

hotSandwiches.name: Spicy Buffalo Chicken Melt
hotSandwiches.description: Spicy buffalo chicken, melted pepper jack cheese, and cool ranch dressing sandwiched between slices of toasted sourdough for a perfect balance of heat and creaminess.

drinks.name: Tropical Passion Fruit Smoothie
drinks.description: A refreshing blend of tropical flavors with passion fruit, pineapple, and coconut, creating a cool and revitalizing smoothie.

drinks.name: Iced Caramel Macchiato
drinks.description: Espresso and milk over ice, sweetened with vanilla syrup and finished with a drizzle of caramel for a delightful iced coffee experience.

drinks.name: Mint Mojito Lemonade
drinks.description: Freshly squeezed lemonade with a hint of mint and a splash of sparkling water, creating a refreshing and invigorating beverage.

desserts.name: Decadent Chocolate Mousse
desserts.description: Rich chocolate mousse topped with a dollop of whipped cream and a sprinkle of cocoa for a decadent and indulgent treat.

desserts.name: Homemade Cheesecake
desserts.description: New York-style cheesecake with a creamy texture, nestled in a buttery graham cracker crust, and topped with your choice of delightful fruit topping.

desserts.name: Warm Apple Pie
desserts.description: A classic slice of warm apple pie with a flaky crust, served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream for a comforting and homestyle dessert.
